title: Verborgene Schwert (Das)
notes: 2004 Yoji Yamada samurai drama about low-ranking samurai in Edo period - Japanese title distinctive, part of Yamada's samurai trilogy

title: Verbotene Sehsucht (F ´1987_chocolat_afrique)
notes: 1988 Claire Denis directorial debut about colonial Cameroon and interracial desire - distinctive postcolonial French cinema

title: Verirrte Seelen – Vinyan (Emauelle Beart)
notes: 2008 Fabrice Du Welz psychological horror with Emmanuelle Béart searching for son in Burmese jungle after tsunami - distinctive atmospheric thriller

title: Verrückt vor Liebe (Fool for Love_USA ´1985_/TR)
notes: 1985 Robert Altman adaptation of Sam Shepard play with Shepard, Kim Basinger about destructive desert motel reunion - distinctive claustrophobic chamber piece

title: Victoria – Männer u. andere Missgeschicke (D ´15)
notes: 2015 Sebastian Schipper Berlin heist thriller filmed in single 140-minute take with Laia Costa - distinctive technical achievement

title: Vier Mal – Le quattro Volte
notes: 2010 Michelangelo Frammartino contemplative Italian film about cycles of life in Calabrian village - dialogue-free, distinctive slow cinema
